name: Moreish
close_time: Open pick up 10 am to 6pm , order 24 hours before for cupcakes, 4 days a head for birthday cakes
description: Its an unending quest for ever gooier centers and choclatier chocolate with the objective of staying ahead of the cutthroat competition.
tip: Be creative and try a non chocolate flavor.
review:
Its an unending quest for ever gooier centers and choclatier chocolate with the objective of staying ahead of the cutthroat competition.

මට හමුවුණා තවත් ගෘහස්ථ කප්කේක් සැපයුම්කරුවෙක්. ඒ තමයි මොරෙයිෂ් (Moreish). මම කාලා බැලුවා ඇගේ චොකලට් ලාවා කප්කේක් එකක්. එය ‍ඉතා හොඳයි.
